Name: Bounty
About the game: Mask up! On an odd, devastated world lives a strange race of humanoid blobs. Though most living things are extinct, blob-kind clings to life through a network of air-tight buildings connected by sprawling networks of underground tunnels. As one of the few blobs with the courage to explore the dusty remains of your city, you profit from sifting through the wreckage of the past - but tread lightly! Where there's opportunity, there's competition. Movement is the Key to Your Survival!l Engage in fast-paced and brutal combat that will put your reflexes to the test. Swap between weapons and chug consumable items on the fly to get an edge on your opponents. Unleash Carnage! Wreak havoc on your enemies to generate Carnage, then unleash it to trigger devastating special attacks! Weapons! Your weapons are specialized tools of destruction; each one has its own unique special ability. Dual wield weapons to chain together devastating strikes, or wield a single weapon to unleash Carnage with style. Explore a dangerous and unpredictable world! New discoveries and challenges lurk around every corner. With great danger comes great rewards! Defeat enemies to earn powerful randomized loot drops that will let you customize every aspect of your character. Make friends along the way! Recruit companions to help you in combat, or simply to keep you company. It's a lonely, dusty world out there.
